articles.title: NASA's NuSTAR Spots Highest-Energy Light Ever Detected From Jupiter – And Solves a Decades-Old Mystery - SciTechDaily

articles.title: SpaceX Starlink satellites disintegrate over Puerto Rico in new footage - Daily Mail
articles.description: The footage was captured by a camera in Añasco, Puerto Rico, and shows what's strongly suspected to be ill-fated Starlink satellites disintegrating.
articles.content:
Two of SpaceX's ill-fated Starlink satellites can be seen disintegrating over Puerto Rico in stunning new footage.

articles.title: Living 'robofish' built from human cardiac cells swims just like a fish - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 'biohybrid' recreates muscle contractions of a pumping human heart to push its tail fin side to side, report researchers at Harvard University in Cambridge, Massachusetts.
articles.content:
